name: Overdue (The Life and Death of a Librarian)
name_original: Overdue (The Life and Death of a Librarian)
description:
IF AUDIO IS SUPER GLITCHY, SWITCH FROM CHROME TO FIREFOX OR USE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION

"In my library at the end of the world, I'm the last human-- and the last LIBRARIAN alive..."

Controls:

WASD or ARROWS: Move
SPACE: Jump... When unlocked
SHIFT: Center Camera
